languages.text: "Более пессимистичный прогноз гласит, что флот Осознание погряз в мраке схизмы и в данный момент пребывает в агонии праведного самоочищения от греха".

traits.locale_text: "Более пессимистичный прогноз гласит, что флот Осознание погряз в мраке схизмы и в данный момент пребывает в агонии праведного самоочищения от греха".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."
languages.original_text: "Более пессимистичный прогноз гласит, что флот Осознание погряз в мраке схизмы и в данный момент пребывает в агонии праведного самоочищения от греха".

traits.locale_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Consciousness Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Consciousness Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

traits.locale_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “更悲观的预测认为，真理开拓者舰队已经处于分裂状态，目前正在承受自我净化的神圣痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

traits.locale_text: “更悲观的预测认为，真理开拓者舰队已经处于分裂状态，目前正在承受自我净化的神圣痛苦。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La predicción más pesimista supone que la Flota de Conocimiento sucumbió al cisma y ahora sufre la justa agonía de la autopurificación».
languages.original_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

traits.locale_text: «La predicción más pesimista supone que la Flota de Conocimiento sucumbió al cisma y ahora sufre la justa agonía de la autopurificación».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「より悲観的な予想では、コグニサンス艦隊は分裂に屈し、現在、自浄作用という正しき苦悶の只中にあるとされる」
languages.original_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

traits.locale_text: 「より悲観的な予想では、コグニサンス艦隊は分裂に屈し、現在、自浄作用という正しき苦悶の只中にあるとされる」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die pessimistischere Prognose geht davon aus, dass die Erkenntnisflotte sich der Spaltung ergeben hat und gerade die rechtschaffenen Qualen der Selbstreinigung erleidet."
languages.original_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

traits.locale_text: "Die pessimistischere Prognose geht davon aus, dass die Erkenntnisflotte sich der Spaltung ergeben hat und gerade die rechtschaffenen Qualen der Selbstreinigung erleidet."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Selon la projection la plus pessimiste, la Flotte de la Connaissance aurait succombé au schisme et serait actuellement en proie au calvaire vertueux de l'autopurification. »
languages.original_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

traits.locale_text: « Selon la projection la plus pessimiste, la Flotte de la Connaissance aurait succombé au schisme et serait actuellement en proie au calvaire vertueux de l'autopurification. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

languages.text: "Daha pesimist bir çıkarım sonucunda, Malumat Filosu'nun bölünmeye kurban gittiği ve şu anda kendi kendini arındırma kaynaklı, haklı bir ızdırap çektiği varsayımına ulaşılabilir."
languages.original_text: "The more pessimistic projection assumes the Cognisance Fleet succumbed to the schism and is currently suffering the righteous agony of self-purification."

traits.locale_text: "Daha pesimist bir çıkarım sonucunda, Malumat Filosu'nun bölünmeye kurban gittiği ve şu anda kendi kendini arındırmadan kaynaklı haklı bir ızdırap çektiği varsayımına ulaşılabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
